title: I have an idea!!
body:
Lets change poppy's champion select quote to her new voice?

someone on the boards already mentioned this when she came out, and i just assumed it would get fixed immediately, but it still hasn't, its not a hard task to do.

the same thing happened with Gangplank, and took way longer than it needed to, to fix. 

Everything about the old poppy makes me cringe, including her voice, her new one is much much nicer, so why wait for changing it?
